headline: The end of Hollywood or a brighter future? What a Paramount-owned Warner Bros. means for the movies
summary: Two of Hollywood’s oldest studios may be consolidating into one.  In a shocking twist after a monthslong bidding war, Paramount has emerged as the apparent victor in the fight to acquire Warner Bros.  Netflix, who backed away from the deal Thursday, had hoped to win the movie studio and its vast film library.

headline: How Investors May Respond To Walt Disney (DIS) Communications Chief Exit Amid CEO Transition to Josh D’Amaro
summary: The Walt Disney Company recently announced that Senior Executive Vice President and Chief Communications Officer Kristina Schake will leave after March 18, 2026, aligning her departure with the end of Bob Iger’s tenure and the planned handover to incoming CEO Josh D’Amaro. Her exit closes a chapter in which she guided communications around Disney’s leadership reshuffle, streaming integration milestones, legal battles, and major expansion moves, raising fresh questions about how the new...
